Table A.2 German Brown Coal Production (x 1,000 metric tons) 1937/38 1938/39 1939/40 1940/41 1941/42 1942/43 Reic With Protectorate 227,493 235,978 249,783 Without Protectorate 187,228 199,564 211,606 226,753 235,131 248,850 East Elbia  47,143 52,153 56,602 61,402 63,675 66,357  Central Germany Rhineland  82,405 56,322 86,998 58,934 92,856 60,876  100,572 63,531  104,587 65,547  111,148 70,097 Mar. 24,690 1944/45 Apr. 22,478 May 23,736 June 23,169 July 22,629 Aug. 22,579 Sept. 18,797 Oct. 16,259 Nov. 14,188 Dec. 14,332
